create.notes: Successfully created a 360° review cycle named 'Test Q1 360 Review Validation' using a 4-step wizard: 1) Basic info (name, peer nomination period, feedback submission period, review finalization period), 2) Select participants (selected 2 employees: Abhishek Sharma, Abhi Gupta), 3) Setup peer nominations, 4) Review and send. Success message displayed: '360° review created and participants invited'. Review appeared in the main list with status 'Pending Peer Nominations'.

read.notes: Successfully viewed the detail page for the created review. Detail page opened with multiple tabs: Overview, Peer nominations, Surveys, Responses, Reports. Overview tab showed the review information including timeline, participants, and current status.

update.notes: Successfully updated the review name from 'Test Q1 360 Review Validation' to 'Test Q1 360 Review Validation - Updated'. Edit functionality uses the same 4-step wizard as create. Changes persisted and were visible in the main list view.

delete.notes: Successfully deleted the test review. Delete option found in the three-dot action menu. Confirmation dialog appeared: 'Are you sure you want to delete this 360° review? This 360° review will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered.' After confirmation, success message displayed: '360° review deleted successfully.' Review was removed from the list (count changed from 4 to 3 reviews).

workflow_integration.notes: Searched for '360' in the workflow trigger selection dialog. No 360 Feedback or 360 Reviews application found in the available triggers list. Available applications include: Bayzat Timesheet, Bayzat Employee Ticket, Accounts Payable, Bayzat Knowledge Hub, Bayzat HR, Custom Recurring Events, Bayzat Timeoff, Bayzat Newsfeed, Bayzat Payroll, Bayzat Custom Fields, Bayzat Insurance, Incoming Integration, Bayzat Attendance. The 360 Feedback feature does NOT have workflow integration at this time.

approval_flow_validation.notes: Searched for '360' in the approval flows search box. No approval flow tab found for 360 Feedback or 360 Reviews. Available approval flow tabs include: Leave, Air Ticket, Loan, Expense, Payroll Transaction, Leave Salary Request, Attendance Regularization, Leave Encashment, Accounts Payable, Employee Violation, Shift Change Request, Grievance Submission, Business Trip Request, Hourly permission, Bank Account Update, Work From Home Request, Project Hours, Employee Grade Change, After-expiry Ticket, WFH, Salary Changes, VAT Filing, Employee Survey, Corporate Tax Filing, Hiring Requisition, Travel Booking Request, Timesheet Approval, Per Diem, and various custom tickets. The 360 Feedback feature does NOT have approval flow configurations.

settings_exploration.notes: 360° feedback configurations is accessible under Settings > Performance. It has a 'New' badge indicating recently added feature. Two tabs available: 'Feedback categories' and 'Question bank'. Companies can configure feedback categories and questions that will be used during 360° feedback reviews. Default categories are provided out of the box.

known_limitations.limitation: The current 360 Feedback implementation is more basic and missing advanced features typically expected in full 360-degree performance systems
known_limitations.workaround: Use the available feedback categories and question bank to customize reviews; supplement with external 360 tools if advanced analytics are needed
known_limitations.validation_notes: Confirmed through exploration. While the feature supports multi-source feedback (self, peers, manager), it lacks advanced reporting, calibration, and analytics found in mature 360 systems. Feature is marked as 'Beta' indicating it's still being developed.

known_limitations.issue: No automated evaluation scheduling linked to probation periods
known_limitations.limitation: 360 reviews must be manually created and scheduled; no automatic triggering based on employee probation end dates or tenure milestones
known_limitations.workaround: Manually track probation periods and create 360 reviews as needed; use calendar reminders or project management tools for scheduling
known_limitations.validation_notes: Confirmed - no workflow triggers exist for 360 Feedback feature, and no automated scheduling options found during exploration of the creation wizard.

known_limitations.issue: Missing advanced 360 feedback reports and analytics
known_limitations.limitation: Limited reporting capabilities; lacks advanced analytics like competency heatmaps, comparison charts, trend analysis, or aggregated team insights
known_limitations.workaround: Export data manually and use external BI tools for advanced analysis if needed
known_limitations.validation_notes: Could not fully validate during this session as Reports tab was not explored in detail. However, feature's Beta status and basic nature suggest this limitation is likely accurate.

known_limitations.issue: No comprehensive 360 feedback report views for different roles
known_limitations.limitation: Reporting may not be tailored for different stakeholder views (employee, manager, HR admin)
known_limitations.workaround: None - work with available reporting options
known_limitations.validation_notes: Not validated - Reports tab and different user role perspectives were not explored during this session.

known_limitations.issue: Inability to edit 360 feedback content once created
known_limitations.limitation: Once a 360 review cycle is launched and participants are invited, the feedback questions and structure may not be editable
known_limitations.workaround: Carefully review all configurations before launching; create new review cycle if changes are needed
known_limitations.validation_notes: Not fully validated - while Edit option is available in the action menu, it's unclear if all fields remain editable after participants have been invited and reviews are in progress. This requires testing with an active review cycle.

known_limitations.limitation: Some aspects of 360 feedback configuration may be limited or require specific setup in the broader Performance Management module
known_limitations.workaround: Work with available configuration options; contact Bayzat support for advanced setup needs
known_limitations.validation_notes: Confirmed that configuration is centralized in Settings > Performance > 360° feedback configurations. The feature is marked as 'New' and Beta, suggesting ongoing development and potential configuration limitations.
